value.title: Maintain Bar Thickness(Width) in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more Short Video of Power BI. In this video, I'm going to explain how you can maintain the thickness of your bar in  Power BI. value.title: Show Multiple X Axis Value By Hierarchy in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI September 2022 Feature Summary. During this video we will learn how we can show multiple X-axis value as hierarchy in Power BI. value.title: Sort Legend in Power BI
